utilities

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • utilities.Search
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Search
extends Thread
    Blue styrofoam block search functionality for the robot Goes to cardinal points on the field and searches for blocks at each
    Version:
    3.0

        protected void FOV(double angle)
        Perform a swipe scan of a certain aperture angle to precisely identify block At this stage the robot is ensured to be in close proximity of block
